present.english: I listen to the beautiful sound
The talented musician listens to the old instrument
The large audiences listen to the live music

imperfect.english: I was listening to the beautiful sound
The talented musician was listening to the old instrument
The large audiences were listening to the live music

future.english: I will listen to the beautiful sound
The talented musician will listen to the old instrument
The large audiences will listen to the live music

aorist.english: I listened to the beautiful sound
The talented musician listened to the old instrument
The large audiences listened to the live music

optative.english: I should listen to the beautiful sound

optative.georgian: ნიჭიერმა მუსიკოსმა უნდა მოუსმინოს ძველ ინსტრუმენტს
optative.english: The talented musician should listen to the old instrument

optative.georgian: დიდმა აუდიტორიებმა უნდა მოუსმინონ ცოცხალ მუსიკას
optative.english: The large audiences should listen to the live music

imperative.english: You, listen to the interesting story
You all (you formal), listen to the long speech
